medical_history.chief_complaint: Persistent right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain since dinner last night.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started in the RUQ and has been progressive overnight without resolution. The patient has been nauseous with non-bilious emesis.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Eczema, Dysthymic disorder, Hemorrhoids, obstetric antepartum, Obesity, Chronic constipation, Gestational diabetes.
medical_history.family_history: Father deceased with alcoholism, maternal aunt with colon cancer, maternal grandfather with cancer, mother with colon polyp.
